Question
========

If we were to test H~0~: P = 0 against H~1~: p > 0, with a one-sided risk of 5%, which of the following conclusions is correct?

Answerlist
----------

* One-sided p-value is 0.016, reject H0
* One-sided p-value is 0.016, do not reject H0
* One-sided p-value is 0.064, reject H0
* One-sided p-value is 0.064, do not reject H0

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* One-sided p-value is 0.016, reject H0: Correct
* One-sided p-value is 0.016, do not reject H0: Incorrect
* One-sided p-value is 0.064, reject H0: Incorrect
* One-sided p-value is 0.064, do not reject H0: Incorrect
